request_error_interstitial.there_was_an_.string: There was an error processing your request

org_self_serve.team_step.guest_checkout_.string: Guests are users who do not have an email address with your Organization's domain and will have limited access to content.

org_self_serve.team_step.header.string: Which teams would you like to upgrade to your organization?

org_self_serve.team_step.team_creation_h.string: Which teams would you like to upgrade?

org_self_serve.team_step.teams_shown_des.string: Teams shown are teams you are an admin or owner of

org_self_serve.team_step.team_creation_t.string: You’re an admin or owner of these teams—select as many as you like

org_self_serve.review_step.next_quarterl.string: Next quarterly true-up on {trueUpDate, date, long}

org_self_serve.review_step.true_up_descr.string: A true-up happens every three months. Figma will notify you two weeks in advance via email of new paid seats added to your organization since the last billing period.
Since users can upgrade themselves or be upgraded by others, Figma will not charge for new full seats until after a true-up.
Before a true-up, admins can review new paid seats and choose to either keep them or downgrade them to free, viewer-restricted seats.
On your true-up date, you will be charged a prorated amount for the full seats you decide to keep.

org_self_serve.review_step.annual_renewa.string: Every year, until you cancel your subscription, you will be charged the total below plus amounts for any paid seats added to your Organization through true-ups.

org_self_serve.confirmation_step.order_c.string: Your order of Figma Organization is in and we’re setting it up right now. This will just take a few minutes and when the migration is complete, Figma will automatically refresh and we’ll send you an email letting you know.

org_self_serve.confirmation_step.total_a.string: Total amount to be charged to card ending in {last4}

org_self_serve.details_step.company_disp.string: Display name in Figma (if different legal company name)
Desired company display name (if different from above)

org_self_serve.modals.invalid_email.figm.string: Figma Organization only allows work emails

org_self_serve.modals.invalid_email.chan.string: To continue with your upgrade to Figma Organization, you will need to be using a work email address. Please change the email address of your account to proceed.

org_self_serve.modals.existing_org_admin.string: You are already the admin of a Figma Organization plan. If you need another Organization plan, please {contactSales}.
